current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To require the Federal Trade Commission to prescribe
		  regulations regarding the collection and use of personal information obtained
		  by tracking the online activity of an individual, and for other
		  purposes.
